message.name: ERR_XFV_NUM_CASES_OR_PERCENTAGE_CASES_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: Please enter either the number of cases or the percentage of cases.

message.name: ERR_XFV_NUM_CASES_AND_PERCENTAGE_CASES_ENTERED
message.locale: Please enter either the number of cases or the percentage of cases but not both.

message.name: ERR_XFV_NUM_CASES_EXCEEDS_TOTAL_CASES
message.locale: The number of cases selected exceeds the total number of cases available.

message.name: ERR_XFV_PERCENTAGE_CASES_EXCEEDS_MAX
message.locale: The percentage of cases selected exceeds %1n.

message.name: ERR_XFV_NO_CRITERIA_SPECIFIED
message.locale: At least one search criteria must be entered.

message.name: ERR_XFV_START_DATE_TO_NO_START_DATE_FROM
message.locale: A start 'From' date must be entered when a start 'To' date has been entered.

message.name: ERR_XFV_END_DATE_TO_NO_END_DATE_FROM
message.locale: An end 'From' date must be entered when an end 'To' date has been entered.

message.name: ERR_XFV_TIME_PERIOD_TO_NO_TIME_PERIOD_FROM
message.locale: A time period 'From' date must be entered when a time period 'To' date has been entered.

message.name: ERR_XFV_CERTIFICATION_DATE_TO_NO_CERTIFICATION_DATE_FROM
message.locale: A certification 'From' date must be entered when a certification 'To' date has been entered.

message.name: ERR_XFV_START_DATE_TO_BEFORE_START_DATE_FROM
message.locale: The start 'To' date must not be before the start 'From' date.

message.name: ERR_XFV_END_DATE_TO_BEFORE_END_DATE_FROM
message.locale: The end 'To' date must not be before the end 'From' date.

message.name: ERR_XFV_TIME_PERIOD_TO_BEFORE_TIME_PERIOD_FROM
message.locale: The time period 'To' date must not be before the time period 'From' date.

message.name: ERR_XFV_CERTIFICATION_DATE_TO_BEFORE_CERTIFICATION_DATE_FROM
message.locale: The certification 'To' date must not be before the certification 'From' date.

message.name: ERR_XFV_END_DATE_FROM_BEFORE_START_DATE_FROM
message.locale: The end 'From' date must not be before the start 'From' date.

message.name: ERR_XFV_END_DATE_TO_BEFORE_START_DATE_TO
message.locale: The end 'To' date must not be before the start 'To' date.

message.name: ERR_XFV_TIME_PERIOD_FROM_BEFORE_START_DATE_FROM
message.locale: The time period 'From' date must not be before the start 'From' date.

message.name: ERR_XFV_TIME_PERIOD_TO_BEFORE_START_DATE_TO
message.locale: The time period 'To' date must not be before the start 'To' date.

message.name: ERR_XFV_CERTIFICATION_DATE_FROM_BEFORE_START_DATE_FROM
message.locale: The certification 'From' date must not be before the start 'From' date.

message.name: ERR_XFV_CERTIFICATION_DATE_TO_BEFORE_START_DATE_TO
message.locale: The certification 'To' date must not be before the start 'To' date.

message.name: ERR_XFV_END_DATE_FROM_BEFORE_TIME_PERIOD_FROM
message.locale: The end 'From' date must not be before the time period 'From' date.

message.name: ERR_XFV_END_DATE_TO_BEFORE_TIME_PERIOD_TO
message.locale: The end 'To' date must not be before the time period 'To' date.

message.name: ERR_XFV_END_DATE_FROM_BEFORE_CERTIFICATION_DATE_FROM
message.locale: The end 'From' date must not be before the certification 'From' date.

message.name: ERR_XFV_END_DATE_TO_BEFORE_CERTIFICATION_DATE_TO
message.locale: The end 'To' date must not be before the certification 'To' date.

message.name: ERR_XFV_START_POINT_EXCEEDS_TOTAL_CASES
message.locale: The start point selected exceeds the total number of cases available.

message.name: ERR_XFV_INTERVAL_EXCEEDS_TOTAL_CASES
message.locale: The interval selected exceeds the total number of cases available.

message.name: ERR_XFV_TIME_PERIOD_SET_STATUS_AND_DECISION_EMPTY
message.locale: Status or decision must be specified when a time period has been entered.

message.name: ERR_XFV_QUERY_AND_EXTERNAL_SERVICE_ENTERED
message.locale: Please select either a query or an external service but not both.

message.name: ERR_XFV_QUERY_OR_EXTERNAL_SERVICE_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: Please select either a query or an external service.

message.name: INF_NO_ALGORITHM_PARAMETERS_REQUIRED
message.locale: The entire list of cases has been selected for audit, therefore no algorithm parameters are required.
